channel.title: Need some help pleeeeeeeeease
channel.description:
Hey its me jdogpwnz..... I made a new mopar account cuz my other one's muted. Well okay heres the problem i am having. I created a new 377 cache client known as Fr0z3n Client. I been working about an hour on making the backround image. But i need some help positioning it. I got the basic picture down but its a little mucked up.
Okay here is how the picture looks when i load my client... [IMG]http://i203.photobucket.com/albums/aa225/jdogpwnz/Image.jpg[/img]
This is how i positioned it to make it flip the right way... [IMG]http://i203.photobucket.com/albums/aa225/jdogpwnz/helpme2.jpg[/img]
So can any1 help me so i can make the image without that black line in the middle? Thanks. If you can help me i will send you the image so you can reposition it to make it right.

item.title: Need some help pleeeeeeeeease
item.dc:creator: @playermanny2 playermanny2
item.description:
@playermanny2 wrote:

image probobly isnt big enough. it should be width= 763 height= 511

Read full topic
